title: 95/586/EC: Council Decision of 22 December 1995 concerning the conclusion of the Agreement constituted in the form of an agreed minute, an exchange of letters, an exchange of notes and the Annexes thereto between the European Community and Canada on fisheries in the context of the NAFO Convention
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 22 December 1995 concerning the conclusion of the Agreement constituted in the form of an agreed minute, an exchange of letters, an exchange of notes and the Annexes thereto between the European Community and Canada on fisheries in the context of the NAFO Convention (95/586/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Agreement constituted in the form of an agreed minute, an exchange of letters, an exchange of notes and the Annexes thereto between the European Community and Canada on fisheries in the context of the NAFO Convention is approved.
The text of the acts referred to in the first paragraph are attached to this Decision.

The Council agrees hereby to conclude the Agreement on behalf of the Community (3).
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
L. ATIENZA SERNA
(1) OJ No C 239, 14. 9. 1995, p. 8.
(2) Opinion delivered on 15 December 1995 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(3) The date of entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities by the General Secretariat of the Council.
